net.foxycorndog.thedigginggame.map

Class Chunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.thedigginggame.map.Chunk

  • public class Chunk
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds the information for each of the chunks. Such information includes the relative location of the chunk, the size of a Chunk, and the tiles in the chunk.
    Since:
    Feb 22, 2013 at 4:23:18 AM, v0.1
    Version:
    Mar 3, 2013 at 4:51:19 PM, v0.1
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chunk

        public Chunk(Map map,
     int rx,
     int ry)
        Constructs a Chunk in the specified Map at the specified relative location.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the Chunk to.
        rx - The relative horizontal location.
        ry - The relative vertical location.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public void generate()
        Method that generates the terrain of the chunk.

      • addGenerateHook

        public void addGenerateHook(java.lang.Thread hook)
        Add a Thread hook that will be called after the generation of this Chunk has finished.
        Parameters:
        hook - The Thread hook instance to add.

      • addTile

        public boolean addTile(Tile tile,
              int x,
              int y,
              int layer,
              boolean replace)
        Adds a Tile to the newTile queue. The update() method has to be called after this call to update the Buffers.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile to add to the queue.
        x - The horizontal location of the new Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        y - The vertical location of the new Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        Returns:
        Whether a Tile was successfully added or not.

      • removeTile

        public boolean removeTile(int x,
                 int y,
                 int layer)
        Removes a Tile from the Chunk at the specified location. Still needs an update() call afterwards.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal location of the Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        y - The vertical location of the Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        Returns:
        Whether a Tile was successfully removed or not.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int x,
           int y,
           int layer)
        Get the Tile at the specified location in the Chunk.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal offset of the Tile.
        y - The vertical offset of the Tile.
        layer - The layer to get the Tile from.
        Returns:
        The Tile at the location.

        Returns:
